QuestData.Title: Culling the Wild
QuestData.Description: The number of atrocities committed by the Burning Legion is countless. Even as we speak, they send their legion forces against the creatures of this land. Helpless to defend against their power, they fall one by one. $n, help me stop these crimes of nature destroy all which they corrupt. $B$BOver the hill, east of here, you will see the corruption spreading across Bladed Gulch. Kill the ones causing the crime, the Fel Corrupters, and as many Felsworn as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Felsworn Scalewing, 4 Felsworn Daggermaw, and 2 Fel Corrupters.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you delivered the hand of justice?
QuestData.RewardText: I do not pride myself knowing we destroyed what Elune has created, but the corruption needed to be stopped. You have done well $C.
